issue.title: [Dev] Enable ARROW_CUDA when generating API documentations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9276](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9276). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
-Update the post-09-docs.sh script to check that CUDA device is available and use the ubuntu-cuda-docs docker image to generate the apidocs.-

Enable CUDA in the documentation builds by installing nvidia-cuda-toolkit with dummy libraries.
